content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=40.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=40.0, y=-84.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=40.5, y=-82.5) for coal storage
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-83.5) for additional storage

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=0.5, y=28.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Boiler at position (x=0.5, y=28.0)
- Steam Engine at position (x=7.5, y=39.5)
- PipeGroup connecting various positions for water and steam transfer

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (x=0.5, y=0.5) storing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) for additional storage
- Iron Chest at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) storing coal

### Laboratory Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab with automation science packs, currently not powered

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs and outputs for coal transportation
- Belts connecting various positions for material movement

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors due to lack of power in the laboratory
- Connect the lab to a power source to ensure it functions correctly

### Errors due to full storage
- Regularly check and empty storage chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage

### Errors in electricity generation setup
- Ensure all components of the electricity generation setup are connected properly and have the necessary inputs to function.
